title: Go And Give Items To Owner

on_item_throw.title: Event: On Item Throw
on_item_throw.description: Event(s) to run when this mob throws items.

reach_mob_distance.title: Reach Mob Distance
reach_mob_distance.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before giving items to owner.

run_speed.title: Run Speed
run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the owner.

vertical_throw_mul.title: Vertical Throw Multiplier
vertical_throw_mul.description: Sets the vertical throw multiplier that is applied on top of the throw force in the vertical direction.

throw_sound.title: Throw Sound Event
throw_sound.description: Sound to play when this mob throws an item.
